title: Interpretation of the Holy Qur’an in a dream: Seeing that you are listening to a reading in a dream

preview.html: Contents: Seeing the Qur’an, the Book of God, for a single woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, transferring the Qur’an by hand, the gift of a torn Qur’an, reading, listening, buying, and more about Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq. If a person sees in his dream as if he hears or has verses read to him from the Book of God Almighty, the Holy Qur’an, This may indicate this person’s connection to the Qur’an. It may be a sign of this person abandoning and abandoning the Qur’an, and this person avoiding sin and disobedience. This vision indicates the desire of the one who sees it to read, understand, memorize and master the Qur’an. This may indicate that this person enjoins what is right and forbids what is evil in order to see The one who sees that he memorizes the Qur’an or completes the Qur’an is a good omen for the satisfaction of his hopes and desires and the culmination of his glorious work and tireless efforts in his work with success, God willing. Seeing verses of the Holy Qur’an in a dream according to these verses and according to them, there are verses of seeking refuge, there are verses of seeking forgiveness, there are verses of intimidation and torture, and other verses of mercy and compassion. Award. Whoever sees in his dream that he is reading one of the verses that promise Paradise, reward, and justice in the afterlife, then, God willing, he will be rewarded with all goodness from God. And seeing the dreamer as if he read verses from the frightening Holy Qur’an warns of punishment, this is a warning to the dreamer not to rise up and fall into disobedience and disobedience. If a person dreams in his dream that a dead person he knows is reciting verses from the Holy Qur’an among the verses of mercy and good news of Paradise, then this is good news regarding the justice of the dead person’s condition in the afterlife. And vice versa, if he sees him reciting verses from the Qur’an, warning of punishment. Verses of refuge are the verses that a person recites to seek refuge in God from the accursed Satan, and seeing them in a dream means good news from God Almighty and your salvation from worry and distress or falling into a malicious or envious conspiracy. The enemy, God Almighty willing. As for whoever sees himself in his dream reciting verses asking for forgiveness, this is good for justice, guidance, sustenance, kindness, and children, according to what God Almighty says in his beloved Book: (Say, “Ask forgiveness from you.”) O Lord, He is the Forgiving One who sent the sky in abundance and provided you with money and children, created gardens for you, and made rivers for you. As for someone who sees in his dream as if he is asking God for forgiveness after finishing prayer with his face in the direction of the Qiblah, then this is good news that his supplication will be revealed. The Qur’an in a dream is evidence of the purity of the heart. And raising it to a position with God. Seeing reading and memorizing the Qur’an in a dream indicates a person’s righteousness. Reciting the Qur’an in a sick person’s sleep heralds recovery. Hearing the Qur’an in a dream indicates security, peace, and tranquility. If a person sees that he is listening to the Qur’an in his dream and cannot bear to hear it, this portends evil consequences that will befall him from his evil, sins, and transgressions. Seeing an illiterate person (one who does not read or write) as if reading and reciting the Qur’an in his dream portends his imminent death. Other meanings of seeing the Qur’an in a dreamThe Holy Qur’an is the word of God, and it is the only word, and the Qur’an is the book of God that is not devoid of a pure touch. Interpretation of seeing the Holy Qur’an In a dream, Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing the Holy Qur’an in a dream as a great and praiseworthy matter, and carrying the Holy Qur’an

title: Interpretation of a dream about increasing one’s salary according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing an increase in the amount of salary in a dream means kindness, the arrival of blessings and happy news. Whoever sees that his salary has increased or dreams that the pension was more than usual or an increase in my husband’s salary and other interpretations, we will tell you about the unmarried woman, the married woman, the pregnant woman, the divorced woman, the man and the great interpreters such as Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. And others: Interpretation of increasing the salary in a dream Seeing an increase in the salary in a dream means a blessing and indicates that even if the dreamer earns a little money, it will be enough to meet all his needs and make him continue his life without reaching anyone or condemning anyone. The vision also shows that the rich should take an amount of money and give it to the needy At the same time, increasing the dreamer's pension means increasing his ability to cover his personal needs thanks to the money he earns from his work. An increase in the husband's salary in a dream indicates entering a new job that provides greater financial returns than the previous job Seeing an increase in your husband's salary in a dream means that he is constantly looking for an additional source of income in order to save as much money as possible If the salary increases in a dream, this portends excellent profits and unexpected success. If you dream that you receive a bonus in addition to the salary, this vision is a symbol of engaging in a fun hobby with your friends, where you will have a weekend If you see that you are receiving your salary, and you see that the amount is larger than it should be, this means that a good period will come to you and everything you think about will come true. If your salary increases in a dream, and there is no increase in Your salary to the rest of the employees, this means that you will be able to avoid some problems that others will face in real life. If you dream of increasing your salary in a dream, this means profit. This will not necessarily be the case. It may be good news, for example, you may know that you are pregnant or that your wife is pregnant if the fortune teller is a man. If you dream that you have received a large salary, this dream predicts unexpected success in a new project. If you are planning to start a new project, open a store or start a business, this is the best time for that. If you see an increase in salary during a dream, it means that you have to accept all the things that come your way. An increase in salary in your dream means that there is a sudden and spontaneous event in your dream world that brought you good luck, and now you have to be more spontaneous in your real life. As for the increase in salary in your dream, it means that you are about to succeed in all areas of life. Also, an increase in salary in a dream indicates excellent profits in any institution you may work in. If the salary increases in the dream, contrary to what is expected, this dream predicts unexpected profits. Interpretation of salary in a dream If you see a salary in your dream, it means that you will see one of your relatives whom you have not seen for a long time. If you dream of receiving a salary, it means that your financial problems will disappear. If you see in your dream that you are paying a salary to someone , it means that you will be right in your idea about a problem. Seeing that you are getting paid less in

title: Interpretation of a dream about burying a dead person in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a person being buried in a dream for single women, married women, pregnant women, divorced women, and men, burying the dead again, burying the living, interpreting the dead alive according to Ibn Sirin, and more. Burial in a dream is one of the frightening dreams that come to us in dreams that cause a lot of terror and intense fear when we see burial in a dream, which appears In all its various forms, including burying people in a dream or burying the dreamer. In cemeteries and other frightening dreams, where you have a lot of great meanings and interpretations for humans. Then in our article today we review the interpretation of burial in a dream by the great commentator Ibn Sirin, who interpreted it in all the forms that we see. Interpretation of burying the dead in a dream: Whoever sees in a dream that he has died and was buried, then He traveled a long distance and did not find money, and whoever sees that he was buried in a grave without dying, then if he finds out who buried him, he will start with him. Injustice, injustice, and imprisonment, and whoever sees that he died in the grave after that, then he will die in this worry, and if he does not die, then he will be saved from this worry, injustice, and imprisonment, and whoever sees that. He has been delivered to the pit of the grave, and He will deliver him to destruction. Placing him in the grave leads to a house. Or at sunset, this indicates a command for evil and a prohibition of good. As for burying the living, it is deception and deception. Perhaps it shows the wealth of the buried after his poverty and marriage after his celibacy, accompanying him and then being alone, and burying the dead in relation to the living, it indicates that the religion is immersed in its reality and that we bury the dead again in a dream. To turn a blind eye to what he neglected by mistreating him and burying a dead person. The dead person has a union, elite, and tenderness among relatives, and the burial may have been confinement, illness, marriage, a deposit, or a mortgage. Whoever sees that he died or was buried, then he dies without repentance, and whoever sees that he has come out. From the grave and then repented, and burial was said to indicate marriage. If we see that he was buried without death, then he will be imprisoned and painful. Interpretation of burying the dead in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Whoever sees that he is being buried alive, his enemy will be victorious, and if he sees a group that has buried a soul, they agree on his destruction, and there is no good in burial in general. And whoever saw that. He buries his enemy, then strikes him, and whoever sees that he has buried some animal, if his kind is guilty, then he will meet a man related to this kind, even if he is dear. So it is sadness, and perhaps something will be saved, and whoever sees that he is burying an inanimate object, he will care about the world, and whoever sees that he is burying a man who does not need to be buried, then he will. Wasting his property on something that has no effect, perhaps it indicates that he is depositing it in a person because a person is made of dust. Seeing a burial is interpreted in eleven ways: victory, journey, separation, imprisonment, poverty, turmoil, forbidden marriage, weak ability, magic, anguish, and corruption of things. Interpretation of burying the dead in a dream for single people: Seeing a young man being buried in a dream is evidence that his life is very safe and stable. Seeing a young man being buried in a dream is evidence that he will travel abroad in search of a source of livelihood. For a young man to be buried in a dream is evidence that this person will defeat his enemy. Interpretation of burying the dead in a dream for a single woman: Seeing a girl burying a person, and the weather was bad, the sky was raining and there was Clouds and fog in A

title: Interpretation of a dream about giving a bird a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about a bird chirping in a dream Some people want to know the interpretation of a dream about a bird chirping in a dream, and it is one of the disturbing dreams that the dreamer wants to know an explanation for, but he must note that these interpretations are the jurisprudence of interpretation scholars and the site administrators have nothing to do with them, so caution and complete disbelief are required. In these interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about giving a bird in a dream: Seeing a gift for a bird in a dream may indicate good changes that occur to the vision in his life during this period. In the event that a person sees that he received a bird as a gift in a dream, this may indicate positive transformations that occur to the vision in His life during this period. It is possible that seeing the gift of a bird in a dream may indicate the abundance of sustenance and goodness that will come to the visionary during these days, and God knows best. Dreaming of receiving a bird as a gift in a dream may indicate positive changes that will come to the dreamer during this time, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about giving someone candy in a dream. Giving candy in a dream may indicate the love that exists between you and God knows best. A person’s dream that he received candy from another person in a dream may indicate his closeness to him in those days, thanks to God. In the event that there is a vision of giving someone Candy in a dream can indicate the abundance of goodness and ample life that the dreamer can have during this time, and God knows best. In the event that one sees that he received sweets as a gift from another person in a dream, it may be a sign of happiness and goodness that may happen to the dreamer in the future. The coming days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about giving a prayer paper in a dream: A dream about a gift of prayer clothes in a dream may indicate a person’s preaching during these days. If you see a gift of a prayer dress in a dream, this may indicate positive changes that occur to the visionary in his life during those days. It is possible that seeing prayer clothes as a gift in a dream indicates happy events that will come to the dreamer during this time, and God knows best. The vision of offering prayer clothes in a dream may be positive developments that will happen to the dreamer in his life during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream Giving a gift of soap in a dream: Giving a gift of soap in a dream may indicate the goodness and piety that the dreamer has in his life at that time. Seeing someone giving a gift of soap in a dream may indicate a new life that may happen to the dreamer in the coming days, thanks to God. In the event that a person sees that he received a gift of soap in a dream, this may be an indication of the abundance of money and a great living that the dreamer can obtain during this period, thanks to God. In the event that someone sees that he received soap as a gift in a dream, it may mean This is because you are taking advice from other people, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a gift of dishes in a dream: Giving away empty dishes in a dream may indicate some problems and obstacles that the dreamer faces in his life and must be prevented. title: The 20 most important interpretations of a dream about sodomy by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about sodomySodomy is a strange and unknown act called practicing sex in its various forms, but it is not intended for procreation, as many commentators have said, so follow us....! Interpretation of a dream about sodomyCommentators say that seeing the dreamer in a dream practicing sodomy leads to the great sins and transgressions that he has committed in his life. Also, seeing the dreamer in a dream practicing sodomy with a friend symbolizes following desires and following the path of Satan. Seeing a man practicing sodomy in his dream symbolizes the bad behavior that he will do in his life. If the owner of the vision walks the straight path and sees this vision, this means that she will gain many benefits and benefits in her life. If the young man sees the wedding from behind or the anus in a dream, this symbolizes his bad thoughts and bad planning in his life. Also, seeing the dreamer in a dream means that he is practicing sex from behind, this means that he follows heresies and vices, and he must review himself and stay away from them. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is practicing sodomy, this will lead to major material problems that he will face in his life. Interpretation of a dream about sodomy by Ibn SirinThe great scholar Ibn Sirin says that seeing the dreamer practicing sodomy with a friend leads to Corrupt morals that the other party and his followers are known for are heretics and must be avoided. Also, seeing the dreamer in a dream having sex with a man he does not know indicates the mutual benefits between them and the influence that he will gain. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is practicing sodomy with his boss, this indicates that he will soon lose the job he works in. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is having sex with his colleagues, this indicates the good reputation he enjoys among them. The man who watches the practice of sodomy with his brother shows the emergence of major problems and disputes between them, which did not end until after a while. If the dreamer sees in a dream his girlfriend's wedding, this indicates a serious illness and falling into many crises. Interpretation of a dream of sodomy for a single woman Interpretation scholars say that seeing an unmarried woman practicing sodomy leads to moving away from God and not performing prayers and duties. Also, seeing a girl in a dream having sex with a woman she knows means that she falls into many disasters and problems in her life. If the dreamer sees sodomy in a dream, this symbolizes negligence in many matters and he must be vigilant and think about many events that occur. Seeing A dreamer in a dream having sex with a girl he does not know means that he does not listen to the opinions of others and is walking on the wrong path. Seeing the dreamer in her pajamas practicing sodomy with another girl at work indicates that she has abandoned the job she is working on. Interpretation of a dream about sodomy for a married woman Interpreters believe that seeing a married woman in a dream practicing sodomy leads to major psychological problems that she will face during that period. Also, seeing the dreamer in a dream having sex against his will indicates a constant feeling of helplessness and extreme despair in her life. As for seeing the dreamer in a dream practicing sodomy and feeling helpless, it symbolizes

The man who observes the practice of sodomy with his brother shows the emergence of major problems and disagreements between them, which did not end until after a while. If the dreamer sees in a dream his girlfriend’s wedding, this indicates A serious illness and falling into many crises. Interpretation of a dream about sodomy for a single woman: Interpretation scholars say that seeing an unmarried woman practicing sodomy leads to turning away from God and not performing prayers and obligations. Also, seeing a girl in a dream having sex with a woman she knows means that she will fall into many disasters. And problems in her life. If the dreamer sees sodomy in a dream, this symbolizes negligence in many matters and he must be alert and think about many of the events that are occurring. Seeing a dreamer in a dream having sex with a girl he does not know means that he does not listen to the opinions of others and goes along In the wrong way. Seeing the dreamer in her pajamas practicing sodomy with another girl at work indicates that she has abandoned the job she is working on. Interpretation of a dream about sodomy for a married woman: Interpreters believe that seeing a married woman in a dream practicing sodomy leads to major psychological problems that she will face during that Period. Also, seeing the dreamer in a dream having sex against his will indicates a constant feeling of helplessness and extreme despair in her life. title: What is the interpretation of the dead chasing the living in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Dreams are the last means of communication with the world of the dead as we are no longer able to meet them in the real world, and most people are happy to dream of a lover they lost dearly after their death, and a person may dream of the dead. He asks for a request, gives something, or takes something, but what happens when he dreams of the dead person chasing him and pursuing him? This vision may seem frightening to some, but what is the true interpretation of this vision? Chasing dead people in the neighborhood in a dream? This is what we learned in this article. Chasing the dead in the living in a dream by Ibn Sirin What is the interpretation of the dead chasing the living in a dream according to Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a dead person as if he were alive in a dream is generally a source of upcoming livelihood and goodness that the dreamer will receive. As for the dead person chasing a living person in a dream, there are many interpretations, including: Perhaps the dreamer had wronged this dead person a lot before his death, and if the dead person running away from him was his father or mother, then this indicates that he was not fair to him in his life, and that he died angry. From him. Perhaps the vision indicates many problems that haunt him and he wants to escape from them, or something that he actually fears and hates facing. If the deceased was a person dear to him and known to love him very much, such as if this deceased was his father, mother, or brother, then the dream may mean that this deceased wants to walk in... The path of truth and avoids disobedience. And his sins so that he does not meet the fate he met after his death and his reckoning. Seeing the dead person chasing the dreamer to take food from him, this means that the dead person needs charity and begging, and the dreamer must pray over him and give alms on his behalf. If the deceased chases the dreamer until he reaches an unknown place and stays with him, The dream could be a harbinger of the imminent death of the pioneer. If you have a dream and do not find its interpretation, go to Google and type in the Egyptian dream interpretation site. Chasing dead people in the neighborhood in a dream about Nabulul. The dream indicates the dreamer’s desire to return to the path of truth and guidance before his time comes, like a dead person who It haunts him or indicates his approaching death. If the dreamer leaves him dead on a horse or any kind of animal, the dream symbolizes his desire for isolation and his withdrawal from the world. Chasing the dead in the neighborhood in a dream for a single woman The dream may mean that you lose some good marriage opportunities from an unmarried woman and move away About her, and if the dead man is someone whom the unmarried woman did not really love before his death, then the dream is just a sign of that. Hate. Perhaps the dream means that there is a secret or relationship in her life that she is trying to hide from everyone. Dreaming about chasing an unmarried woman indicates that he will be exposed to trouble and misery because of her bad behavior, or that he is surrounded by one or more friends who are behaving badly and they should stay away from her. If the dead person who is chasing her Of her relatives, the dream may indicate her desire for independence, away from her family, and for her to be the one who makes her own decisions. Chasing the dead in the neighborhood in a dream for a married woman. A married woman running away from a dead man in their dream indicates her unhappiness in her married life and her desire for abandonment and divorce. If I felt like a married woman

title: Is the appearance of lice a sign of witchcraft?

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing whether the appearance of lice is a sign of witchcraft in a dream for one girl. Seeing lice multiplying badly in the dreamer’s home or place of residence is a sign of witchcraft. It also explains that lice walking on the human body in a dream is lesser magic. And if lice walk on clothes Interior of the dreamer, it is interpreted as magic in her private life. Seeing that an unmarried woman is reading in a dream and seeing lice appearing from the house in a dream. The appearance of lice from her clothes in a dream and their appearance on her body from the outside is interpreted as magic. It also suggests talking to enemies in A dream and seeing lice on their bodies in a dream. And if she sees her fiancé seeing lice on his clothes, this is magic for her. What if she sits with someone she knows, and she puts lice on her, a sign of magic in her life. If she sees her head full of lice, this is a sign of magic in a dream about her work And study it. See also: Dreams that show witchcraft. Interpretation of seeing whether the appearance of lice is a sign of witchcraft in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman quarreling with her husband and seeing lice in a dream indicates witchcraft. Seeing lice in abundance in her home and not being able to eliminate them in the dream is crucial. A large lice in a dream walking on her body in a dream explains that there is magic for her. If he tries to kill the lice one by one, but he cannot dream. Seeing small black lice in a dream is a clear and clear interpretation of the presence of magic for them. And if you look at a lice walking on Her husband’s naked body in a dream, this is a sign of that. If she tries to leave the house and run away and sees lice chasing her in the dream. It indicates harmful things that she is trying to force into her life and her husband with magic and she must be careful. Seeing a married woman seeing lice on the head of her children indicates intense envy of them. Interpretation of seeing whether the appearance of lice is a sign of witchcraft in a divorced woman’s dream. A divorced woman saw lice on her legs in a dream and it did not disappear in the dream. She explains the magic in her life and what it did to her by entering her house and being close to her. If a divorced woman sees a lot of lice in a dream on her naked body This is an indication that someone was trying to destroy her life and succeeded in a magical way. The divorced woman is trying to get rid of lice in her house in a dream. Here the meaning is explained that he will face difficult days in this endless period. This dream for the divorced dreamer is only a warning to her of the presence of An evil person in her life. He is trying hard to harm her and she must approach God and listen to Surat Al-Baqarah. Lice in a dream, even if it is black and small, is considered one of the weakest charms of a divorced woman. Read also: Interpretation of seeing lice in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq Interpretation of seeing lice appearing As a sign of witchcraft in a man’s dream and its meaning. If one sees in a dream that lice appeared in the dream from the food that he ate in the dream. It indicates the witchcraft of a close man who is trying to keep him away from his livelihood and the money he earns. And when he saw that lice coming out of the dreamer’s body in the dream, he became afraid. It explains its meaning. These things indicate the presence of magic in his life, and he must be careful. If he cleans up

title: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about prayer for an unmarried woman

preview.html: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the dream of prayer for an unmarried woman: Prayer is a means of drawing closer to God and strengthening the relationship between the servant and his Lord, as it erases the sins of the Muslim and increases his good deeds as it is. An important factor in its integrity and safety; Because it forbids immorality and evil, and is one of the reasons for entering Paradise, and seeing prayer in a dream suggests to the dreamer that something indicates goodness or livelihood, and through the lines of this. We will reveal to you an article about the meaning of this dream according to Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of this vision. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the dream of prayer for an unmarried woman. Ibn Sirin interpreted the vision of prayer in a dream for an unmarried woman as one of the praiseworthy dreams that indicate the disappearance of worries and the approach of trickery. If an unmarried woman sees it in The dream is that she is praying in a group, then this vision is an indication of the approaching date of marriage, and God knows best, in the case of her obligatory prayer. If an unmarried woman dreams that she is praying during her prayer, this is a vision that bodes well and indicates the ease of her circumstances and the approaching date of her marriage. Seeing istikharah in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates On a change in circumstances and change for the better. Seeing single people praying at home is good news for sustenance and removing worries. As for the duration of prayer in the mosque, it indicates engagement, whether it is engagement or marriage if she is engaged. If an unmarried woman sees that she did not perform the prayer in full. Because someone cut off her prayer, this vision indicates that someone who does not deserve her proposes to her. Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of seeing prayer in a dream for a single woman. As for Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation, it did not differ much from Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. It was reported that if an unmarried woman dreams that she is performing the obligatory prayer, then this dream indicates To get married soon, I swear. He knows better. If she arrives outside of her time, then this vision indicates that there will be problems in her life. Ibn Sirin also showed that if a woman sees in a dream that she is performing only half of the prayer, then this vision symbolizes her inability to obey God. Seeing a woman praying Reversing the direction of the Qiblah is a repulsive vision for an unmarried woman, as it indicates that she is committing sins and disobedience, and falling into temptations. Interpretation of the evening prayer in a dream for a single woman. Seeing the evening prayer in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates the fulfillment of desires and the removal of worries. If she is unmarried, she dreams that she is praying, but the opposite The direction of the Qiblah, then this vision shows her distraction and inability to make the right decisions in reality. If an unmarried woman dreams that she is performing the evening prayer with the worshipers, then this vision symbolizes her good morals and closeness to God. We present to you the most prominent interpretations of seeing prayer in a dream and at the end of this We would like to note that all of these interpretations presented represent the jurisprudence of the hermeneutics and it is not certain that they will be achieved in reality at all. Only God knows the unseen.

title: Interpretation of a dream about collecting garbage in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about collecting garbage in a dream In case you want to know the interpretation of a dream about collecting garbage in a dream, one of the dreams is very disturbing, so they are looking for an explanation for this dream, but the reader must also be forbidden from absolute disbelief because the jurisprudence of some scholars who seek to reach the truth may make mistakes and it may be tainted. In addition, the site and its managers have nothing to do with the interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about collecting garbage in a dream: Picking up garbage in a dream may indicate that the dreamer will get rid of many worries and sins during this time. A person’s dream that he was collecting garbage in a dream may indicate difficulties and obstacles that he faces The dreamer is in his life during this period. It is possible that seeing collecting garbage in a dream indicates some obstacles and problems that the dreamer faces during this period, and God knows best. Seeing collecting garbage in a dream may indicate bad things that the dreamer may suffer from because of the worries and sorrows that he was dealing with. With her at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about collecting human waste in a dream Collecting human waste in a dream may indicate a cessation in visionary decisions during this period. In the event that a person sees that he is collecting human waste, this may indicate that he feels great fear and anxiety He may suffer from it in those days. Dreaming about collecting human excrement in a dream may indicate the illness that the dreamer is suffering from during this period. If one sees that he has collected human excrement, this may indicate judgments issued to the dreamer during this period and to God. Interpretation of a dream Collecting seafood in a dream Collecting seafood in a dream may indicate that he is a person who is hasty in making his decisions during this time. In the event that one sees that he is collecting seafood, this may indicate a lot of thinking and changes occurring in the life of the dreamer at that time. It is possible that seeing collecting seafood in a dream indicates collecting a lot of money and significant material gains during this period. If a person sees that he was collecting seafood, this indicates the livelihood that the dreamer will obtain in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about collecting Eggshells in a dream Collecting eggshells in a dream can indicate many successes that the dreamer will achieve during this period. In the event that one sees that he is picking eggshells, this may indicate the successes that the dreamer achieved in those days, thanks to God. Seeing someone collecting eggshells in a dream may indicate the blessing and goodness that the dreamer will receive in his life during this time. To see yourself picking eggshells in a dream may indicate positive changes that happen to the dreamer during those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about collecting seashells In a dream: Seeing all sea snails in a dream can mean that the person having the vision will make quick decisions. Seeing snails gathering in a dream means happy events that will come to the dreamer during this period, and God knows best. Seeing yourself gathering sea snails in a dream

title: A dream about numbers in a dream. Meanings of numbers in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Numbers in a dream by Ibn SirinInterpretation of dreamsNumbers in a dream by Ibn Sirin mainly indicate goodness and general nutrition. Dreaming of the number zero in a dream indicates pregnancy in the near future, and this was confirmed by Ibn Sirin and some scholars agreed with him. The dream number 1 inchdreamIt represents the beginning of a new life. It can The number 1 also indicates a new love story. Interpretation of a dream about Nabulsi’s numbers. Al-Nabulsi will interpret seeing the number 1 in a dream as a sign of unity and closeness with God Almighty. Numerology According to Al-Nabulsi, a dream about numbers indicates success and progress in work. A dream about the number 1 in Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation indicates On success and achieving goals. The dream of the number one indicates acumen and knowledge. The interpretation of the dream of numbers for individuals. Numbers in one dream, where the interpretation of the dream number 2 shows beauty and tenderness. The meaning of the numbers in the individual dream. An unmarried girl’s dream with the number 2 is evidence of marriage in the near future. It indicates A girl’s dream of the number 3 indicates a lot of luck and a rich and extensive diet. Seeing the number 4 is evidence of a girl’s feeling of security. The number 7 in a dream indicates a sharing approach. The number 9 in a dream is evidence of achieving goals and desires. Seeing a dream of numbers for a married woman in a dream. Seeing a dream About numbers for a married woman in a dream. A dream about a married woman with the number zero is evidence of pregnancy and feeding a child soon. The number 3 indicates financial stability and a happy married life. A married woman’s dream of seeing the number 4 is evidence of her extreme fear for her children. As for seeing the number 5 in The dream, this is evidence of unpleasant events that may indicate that you will get into some problems. The number 7 shows wealth and a lot of money. Seeing a dream in numbers for a married woman in a dream, dreaming of the number 8 indicates the presence of a very loyal friend and sister. The number 9 in a woman’s dream heralds pregnancy, And also the number 10. What is the interpretation of a dream about numbers for a pregnant woman? Interpretation of a dream about numbers for a pregnant woman Seeing the number 2 in a dream Women Pregnant evidence of the birth of twins or breastfeeding a female. The dream number 4 indicates the soonest birth. The number 5 in the dream indicates the last five months of the dream. Number 7 in a dream indicates the birth of a boy. The dream number 9 indicates the approaching date of birth. Seeing numbers for a man in a dream Seeing numbers for a man in a dream A man’s dream of seeing the number one in a dream is evidence of getting rid of enemies and victory is familiar. Seeing the number 2 is evidence of doubling one’s means of livelihood. The dream. The number 3 indicates the lack of livelihood for the visionary man. The number 4 in a dream indicates kindness and blessings. The number 8 shows the good biography of the dreamer. The number 10 shows wisdom and a great mind. Seeing numbers for a man in a dream. The number 9 in a dream indicates achieving goals. And the fulfillment of dreams. For a young man, dream number 1 indicates intelligence and a close relationship. The number 4 in one dream indicates kindness and abundant food. Seeing numbers for a man in a dream Dream number 5 indicates the end of problems and troubles that the young man suffers from. The number 9 for one young man indicates Engagement.with
